actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, in order to apply to disabled veterans of the Vietnam era the same standards of eligibility for automobiles and adaptive equipment as are applied with respect to disabled veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict.

summary.text: Extends to disabled veterans of the Vietnam era the same standards of eligibility for automobiles and adaptive equiptment as apply with respect to disabled veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1901 (1) (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, in order to apply to disabled veterans of the Vietnam era the same standards of eligibility for automobiles and adaptive equipment as are applied with respect to disabled veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict.
